title: The screen is always on when charging
answer:
Go to Developer options to change the settings. The developer options will be hidden on some phone models by default. 

 Step 1 Go to Settings and then select About phone. 

 Step 1 Keep touching the version number until the screen displays a prompt showing that you have entered the developer mode. 

 Step 1 Go back to Settings, select Developer options and deselect the Stay awake check box.
keywords: screen won't switch off, cannot turn screen off, steady on
